item.title: Want to Contribute on Raising Awareness About Environment and Green Issue Within Permaculture and Coding
item.description: I’d like to distribute this country’s eco system. Since the nature’s disaster have been taken place, this country needs raising the awareness on Balancing with nature. We need make a balance and respect this nature. Many people got economically damaged or lost living because of the disasters. Flood damages, landslides, abnormally increased moths, careless chemical cropping, broken eco system and the fine particles problems. All the things are the sign that people are not well-minded

item.title: About Grasses in Permaculture
item.description: The affect of unnamed glasses They absorb the carbon then giving to the crops near 부분의 사람들은 잡초가 작물의 양분을 뺏을까 걱정하며 제거하기에 바쁘지만 잡초를 뽑으면 득보다 실이 많다는 것이 김 박사의 주장이다. 잡초가
